q1.content: Tell me more about your workplace. How long have you been at your current job? How would you describe the benefits that come with your job? (This could include things like health benefits, paid time off, vacation, and sick time.)
q1.requirement: If the participant says they do not work, your objective is accomplished. If not, inquire about the benefits provided by the interviewee's job, such as health benefits and paid leave.

q2.content: How would you describe your relationships at work? (How is your relationship with your manager or boss? How are your relationships with your coworkers?)
q2.requirement: If the participant says they do not work, your objective is accomplished. If not, explore the nature of the interviewee's relationships with their manager, boss, and coworkers.
